level.heading: Combination and division of trusts.
level.text: After notice to the qualified beneficiaries, a trustee may combine 2 or more trusts into a single trust or divide a trust into 2 or more separate trusts, if the result does not impair rights of any beneficiary or adversely affect achievement of the purposes of the trust.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 19-1304.10 and § 19-1305.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 417 of the Uniform Trust Code.
